aboutMe.title: About Me
description: Hello, my name is VÃ­ctor Manuel

I am a web developer specialized in creating functional and attractive digital solutions, based in the Principality of Asturias. My focus is on full-stack web development, interface design, and user experience optimization. I use modern technologies such as Astro, React, and Java.

Currently, I develop and manage personal projects to constantly improve my technical skills and ensure the highest quality at every stage of the process. I have a driver's license and my own vehicle, which allows me to travel without inconvenience to collaborate on projects that require local presence or assistance in different locations.
